title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is being lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter should be retained after modifying the default value.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the report that contains a list box parameter.
2. Set a default value for the list box parameter.
3. Modify the default value.
4. Observe that the modified default value is not retained in the list box parameter.
